extendedInfo.description: A lot of Arduino examples with code,diagrams and images for arduino beginners and programmers. Take a look at it and master it.Contains Examples from Basics, Digital, Analog, CommunicationControl Structures,Sensors,Core Functions, Digital, Display, Strings,USB (Leonardo, Micro, and Due specific examples),Keyboard,Mouse.----------------------------------------Analog In, Out SerialAnalog InputAnalogInOutSerialAnalogWriteMegaCalibrationFadingSmoothingASCII TableDimmerGraphMIDIMultiSerialMegaPhysicalPixelRead ASCII StringSerial Call Response ASCIISerial Call ResponseSerial input (Switch (case) Statement)SerialEventVirtual Color MixerArraysFor Loop (aka The Knight Rider)If StatementSwitch (case) Statement, used with sensor inputSwitch (case) Statement, used with serial inputWhile LoopAnalog Read SerialBareMinimumBlinkDigital Read SerialFadingReadAnalogVoltageBlink Without DelayButton State Change Detection (Edge Detection)ButtonDebounceInput Pullup SerialPitch followerSimple KeyboardToneTone4LED Bar GraphRow-columm Scanning to control an 8x8 LED MatrixAnalog Input PinsDigital PinsMemoryPWMADXL3xx AccelerometerKnockMemsic 2125 AccelerometerPing Ultrasonic Range FinderKeyboard and Mouse ControlMore will be updated daily or weekly. Just keep in touch.Keywords :Android, arduino, beginners,Leonardo, Arduino Boards, examples ,programmers, Digital, Communication, USB , diagrams , code

reviews.title: Ads are ridiculous
reviews.comment: ...would give a higher rating but the obnoxious ads on the main screen are far too annoying. I understand it takes time to develop an app, but there are better ways for development to put ads in. I can get the same info from web content without the obnoxious ads. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Jacob Zimmerman IV

reviews.title: Copy of arduino official website
reviews.comment: This app is coolly of arduino official website with ads
reviews.author: Aditya Vikram

reviews.title: Malware
reviews.comment: Uninstalled because of Malware.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spam
reviews.comment: Starts up with a very big Android anti virus ad.
reviews.author: Bill Wilson

reviews.title: Waaaay too many ads
reviews.comment: Nice having the Arduino reference site locally, but not nice enough to suffee through the fullscreen ads amd malware installation offers

reviews.comment: Rubbish

reviews.comment: Goog
reviews.author: Nagesh Kumar

reviews.title: Awesome, but...
reviews.comment: I loved the app and I installed it to have an offline reference on my phone. However, the latest update took that feature away. If the images need a connection, then it\'s not an offline reference. Of course it\'s a bargain between app size vs. Offline availability.
reviews.author: Mohammed Al Sahaf

reviews.title: unnecessary permissions
reviews.comment: why would this app ever need to know my phone status and identity?!
reviews.author: Tarik Kurtovic

reviews.title: Done my heart
reviews.comment: This is so close version on my android.i think it best features on 4.2 version
reviews.author: alfaj khan

reviews.title: Choice has been given
reviews.comment: The paid version has all examples  and images available offline.
reviews.author: Craig Lewis

reviews.title: Bring back offline images.
reviews.comment: Please give us the option to download the images. It\'s very useful for us who work in the field.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: good help for beginners
reviews.comment: there is any chance to see some smart sketches here ?
reviews.author: Grig Barbulescu

reviews.title: Warning, Danger!
reviews.comment: This is MALWARE!
reviews.author: Dale Mogk

reviews.title: Change of permissions...
reviews.comment: Why woiild you want to know where I am? That doesn\'t make any sense!
reviews.author: clay vitus

reviews.title: Do you love telemarketers?
reviews.comment: If so, just install this app. Within minutes the nuisance sales calls will begin on your cell phone. This app sells your phone and caller numbers to whoever wants them. I love the Arduino....I hate telemarketer phone calls on my cellular account. Especially at dinner time.
reviews.author: Owls Rook

reviews.title: Great reference app
reviews.comment: The examples provided are great for beginners and are a great next step from the SparkFun Inventor\'s Kit projects.
reviews.author: Stefan Mohr

reviews.title: Super loaded with adds
reviews.comment: Uninstall, it forces anti virus scan and super loaded with adds. I couldn\'t even open the app.

reviews.comment: Great app
